hanzi-su-wiki:
絶

Значения

Управлять, руководить; линяя родства, контроль; контролировать; прекращать

Мнемоника

  • Надевать ребёнку 充 вожжи из шёлковых ниток 糸, чтобы быстрее научился ходить.

  • "Наматывание цветной 色 нити 糸 было прекращено."

Варианты

絕, 绝

絕絕RS
绝绝		絶discontinue, beyond, sever, cut off, abstain, interrupt, suppress
  • hand desiring 巴 to cut the thread 糸/纟 with force 力

Keyword_KANJIDIC: discontinue, beyond, sever, cut off, abstain, interrupt, suppress
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: прекратить, за его пределами, север, отрезать, воздерживаются, прерывание, подавлять
koohiiStory1: I can't finish my sewing project because the thread color I was using was discontinued.
koohiiStory2: As times move on and fashion tastes inevitably change, threads of certain colors often get discontinued.
jp_example_words:
拒絶(きょぜつ): refusal, rejection
謝絶(しゃぜつ): refusal
絶版(ぜっぱん): out of print
絶望(ぜつぼう): despair, hopelessness
絶える(たえる): to die out, to peter out, to become extinct
絶つ(たつ): to sever, to cut off, to suppress, to abstain (from)
途絶える(とだえる): to stop, to cease, to come to an end
絶対(ぜったい): absolute, unconditional, absoluteness
絶滅(ぜつめつ): destruction, extinction
絶えず(たえず): constantly
jp_readingExamples: 絶える (た.える), 絶つ (た.つ), 絶やす (た.やす)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Sometime in the future, thread of every color will be faced with extinction. Eventually there will be nothing else to make thread out of, and thread of every kind and color will reach extinction.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine what the world would be like without thread. No thread of any color. How would you fix tears in clothes or make new ones? It would be a strange world where thread is extinct.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The extinction of thread was brought on by a very strange thing. Deadly zits (ぜつ). These zits killed off all the producers of thread, and eventually the thread went extinct. Dang zits.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Pretend you have deadly zits. They’re everywhere, not just your face. You can’t pop them or you’ll die, but they’re all bulging and extremely painful. Now you’re facing extinction. Lousy.
Ru_Meaning: discontinue, beyond, sever, cut off, abstain, interrupt, suppress
Ru_Radicals: 小 (маленький), 幺 (короткая нить), 糸 (нить), 色 (цвет)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the thread's (糸) color (色) dies out

絶字的基本解释

絶
jué
见“绝”。

絶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jué］
［《廣韻》情雪切，入薛，從。］
“絕1”的新字形。“绝1”的繁体字。
(1)断，分成两段或几段。
(2)断绝；净尽。
(3)停止。
(4)竭；尽。
(5)杜绝；摒弃。
(6)引申为拒绝。
(7)灭亡；死亡。
(8)缺乏；贫困。
(9)辽远；远隔。
(10)横度；越过。
(11)超过。
(12)独特，独一无二。
(13)副词。极；最。
(14)副词。全然；绝对。
(15)旧诗体裁之一。详“絶句”。

絶字的康熙字典解释

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jué］
["Guangyun" love snow cut, enter Xue, follow. ]
The new glyph of "Absolute 1". Traditional characters of "绝1".
(1) Break, divided into two or more sections.
(2) Severe; clean up.
(3) Stop.
(4) Exhaustion; exhaustion.
(5) Put an end to; abandon.
(6) The extension is rejected.
(7) Perish; death.
(8) Lack; poverty.
(9) Liaoyuan; far away.
(10) Horizontal; cross.
(11) Over.
(12) Unique and unique.
(13) Adverbs. Extremely; most.
(14) Adverbs. Totally; absolutely.
(15) One of the old genres of poetry. Detailed "quatrains".

jué
см. 绝

絶

Значения

Управлять, руководить; линяя родства, контроль; контролировать; прекращать

Мнемоника

  • Надевать ребёнку 充 вожжи из шёлковых ниток 糸, чтобы быстрее научился ходить.

  • "Наматывание цветной 色 нити 糸 было прекращено."

Варианты

絕, 绝

Radicals: 糸, 色  (thread, color)
Meaning Mnemonic
Sometime in the future, thread of every color will be faced with extinction. Eventually there will be nothing else to make thread out of, and thread of every kind and color will reach extinction.
Imagine what the world would be like without thread. No thread of any color. How would you fix tears in clothes or make new ones? It would be a strange world where thread is extinct.
Reading Mnemonic
The extinction of thread was brought on by a very strange thing. Deadly zits (ぜつ). These zits killed off all the producers of thread, and eventually the thread went extinct. Dang zits.
Pretend you have deadly zits. They’re everywhere, not just your face. You can’t pop them or you’ll die, but they’re all bulging and extremely painful. Now you’re facing extinction. Lousy.
